text: Ara tomadera ki hayeche ye tomara ta khabe na yara upare allahâ€Œra nama ullekha kara hayeche, ara tini itipurbe tomadera jan'ya bisadabhabe barnana karechena ya tomadera jan'ya tini nisedha karechena, tabe yatatate tomara badhya ha'o ta byatita? Ara nihsandeha aneke'i bipathe calita kare tadera kheyala-khusira dbara jnanahinata basatah. Nihsandeha tomara prabhu -- tini bhalo janena sima-langhanakaridera.
